DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate pharmacokinetic interaction ASP015K metformin healthy non-elderly male subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Drug Interaction Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics ASP015K Metformin
DOC.criteria: Body weight screening : ≥ 50.0 kg , < 80.0 kg BMI screening : ≥ 17.6 , < 26.4 Subjects agree use highly effective contraception consist two form birth control ( least one must barrier method ) get inform consent 90 day final study drug administration . Subjects agree NOT donate sperm get informed consent 90 day final study drug administration . Subjects receive scheduled receive investigational drug clinical trial postmarketing study within 120 day screen test screen test hospital admission ( Day −1 ) . Subjects receive scheduled receive medication ( include overthecounter drug ) within seven day hospital admission ( Day −1 ) . Subjects receive ASP015K metformin previously . Subjects habit excessive alcohol drinking smoking . Any deviation normal range blood pressure , pulse , body temperature , 12lead ECG screen day hospital admission ( Day −1 ) . Subjects meet follow criterion laboratory test screen day hospital admission ( Day −1 ) . Normal range test specify study site test/assay organization use normal range study . Subjects complication history drug allergy . Subjects history clinically serious allergy , induces generalize urticaria anaphylactic shock require hospital admission . Subjects complication history hepatic disease , renal disease , cardiac disease , congenital short QT syndrome , respiratory disease , gastrointestinal disease . Subjects history gastrointestinal resection . Subjects develop upper gastrointestinal symptom within seven day hospital admission ( Day −1 ) . Subjects complication history endocrine disease , cerebrovascular disease , malignant tumor , lymphatic disease , lactic acidosis . Subjects apply concern regard tuberculosis . Subjects apply concern regard infection tuberculosis . Subjects vaccination live vaccine live attenuate vaccine within 56 day hospital admission ( Day −1 ) .
